title: Apple Kale & Pomegranate Salad
directions: Choose an apple that can easily stand up right or just trim the bottom so it does. And you can use any apple you want here. I used a honey crisp one because I always have them on hand.
Cut the apple width-wise, into rings.
On the top of each ring, add some goat cheese, chopped kale, and pomegranate seeds. Do so for every ring.
